gobblin.metrics.event

Class EventSubmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metrics.event.EventSubmitter

  • public class EventSubmitter
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around Avro GobblinTrackingEvent.Builder simplifying handling GobblinTrackingEvents.

    Instances of this class are immutable. Calling set* methods returns a copy of the calling instance.
